programme.title: Teds
programme.desc: Ir 1993. gads, un lāča Teda slavas brīdis ir pagājis. Viņš dzīvo mājās kopā ar savu labāko draugu Džonu Benetu un viņa ģimeni. Lai gan Teds var slikti ietekmēt Džonu, viņš ir lojāls draugs, kurš noteikti centīsies draudzības dēļ.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla iekļūst drauga Sera Henrija Kliteringa džentlmeņu klubā, lai lūgtu palīdzību. Viņai ir pierādījumi par Zilās ģerānijas slepkavību, un nepieciešama drauga palīdzība, lai apturētu prāvu.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Zoja Strahana satiek brāli Bendžaminu, kurš apgalvo, ka viņam esot finansiālas problēmas. Kad tiek atklāts Bendžaminam līdzīgs līķis, Albergs uzsāk slepkavas meklējumus.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoka izmeklēšana par noslēpumainu slepkavību var būt saistīta ar jaunu ēstuvi, kurā Higinss un Roberts ieguldījuši līdzekļus.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Izmeklējot noduršanas gadījumu, Mērdoks un Brekenrīds nejauši atklāj spiega Terensa Meijersa slepeno civilo dzīvi.

programme.title: Džeina Eira
programme.desc: Džeina atgriežas Tornfīldā pēc Misis Rīdas nāves, un Ročesters beidzot viņu bildina. Vai viņa piekritīs?

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīze un Nešs joprojām nevar sastrādāties, kad saistībā ar kādu lietu ir jānonāk nozarē, kur cilvēki ir gatavi uz slepkavību, tikai lai saglabātu savus noslēpumus.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Kad Kārmodijam izdodas izcili nolikt eksāmenu un viņam piedāvā pētījumu programmu Londonā, Kārmodijs vēlas palikt Skeldeilā. Sigfrīds satraucas, ka viņš tikai kavē Kārmodiju.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad laboratorijā tiek noslepkavota viņu galvenā aizdomās turamā doktore Eleina Montgomerija, Peregrīna un Džeimss ir spiesti redzēt, ka viņu slepkavas motīvi ir daudz dziļāki, nekā viņi abi bija uzdrošinājušies uzskatīt.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza seko bēglim, kurš apsūdzēts slepkavībā. Bēglis ir jāatrod ātrāk par policiju, jo citādi viss tiks zaudēts.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeims sāk dīvaini uzvesties, kā arī pasliktinās viņa veselība. Pamfrijas kundze iejūtas jaunā lomā, bet Holas kundze satur visus kopā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoka izmeklēšana par noslēpumainu slepkavību var būt saistīta ar jaunu ēstuvi, kurā Higinss un Roberts ieguldījuši līdzekļus.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Kad Gvenda Holideja ievācas savā sapņu mājoklī, viņa sāk redzēt spokus. Pēc tam atklājas, ka Gvenda uzauga šajā namā — un mistērija kļūst draudīgāka.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad laboratorijā tiek noslepkavota viņu galvenā aizdomās turamā doktore Eleina Montgomerija, Peregrīna un Džeimss ir spiesti redzēt, ka viņu slepkavas motīvi ir daudz dziļāki, nekā viņi abi bija uzdrošinājušies uzskatīt.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Kad Gvenda Holideja ievācas savā sapņu mājoklī, viņa sāk redzēt spokus. Pēc tam atklājas, ka Gvenda uzauga šajā namā — un mistērija kļūst draudīgāka.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks un Brakenreids ir pārsteigti, kad "Hamleta" aktieris viņu acu priekšā nomirst uz skatuves.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks izmeklē lidmašīnas katastrofu, kuras rezultātā gāja bojā pilots. Atklājas zemisks noslēpums, kas saistīts ar Džeimsu Pendriku.

programme.title: Tesa no dErbervilu cilts
programme.desc: Pēc traumatiskas tikšanās ar manipulatīvo Aleksu nabadzīgā Tesa mēģina atjaunot līdzsvaru savā dzīvē un iemīlas ideālistā Endželā. Kad par sevi atgādina pagātne, šīs jūtas tiek atklātas.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Kad Sisi uzzina, ka Francis ir izņēmis Rūdolfu no armijas, viņa atgriežas Vīnē. Tomēr atmosfēra ir visai nokaitēta, un arī noris sarunas par alianses veidošanu.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Kad Sisi uzzina, ka viņas dēlu ir nolaupījis strādnieks, kurš pieprasa imperatora nāvi, viņa dodas glābt Rūdolfu. Francis seko viņai pa pēdām.

programme.desc: Kad Skotlendjardā darbu sāk jauns detektīvinspektors, Elīzai Skārletai ir jācīnās, lai vēlreiz sevi pierādītu.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Izjūtot spiedienu no mātes, Džeimss Heriots vēlas sekot sapnim, tādēļ izmanto iespēju un dodas uz veterinārārsta asistenta amata darba interviju Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks un Brakenreids ir pārsteigti, kad "Hamleta" aktieris viņu acu priekšā nomirst uz skatuves.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks izmeklē lidmašīnas katastrofu, kuras rezultātā gāja bojā pilots. Atklājas zemisks noslēpums, kas saistīts ar Džeimsu Pendriku.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Limstoka ir pilsēta ar vairākiem apkaunojošiem noslēpumiem, taču, kad Mona Simingtona izdara pašnāvību, miss Mārpla uzskata, ka šis gadījums nav tik pašsaprotams.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Kad Skotlendjardā darbu sāk jauns detektīvinspektors, Elīzai Skārletai ir jācīnās, lai vēlreiz sevi pierādītu.

programme.desc: Izjūtot spiedienu no mātes, Džeimss Heriots vēlas sekot sapnim, tādēļ izmanto iespēju un dodas uz veterinārārsta asistenta amata darba interviju Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Albergs un Gibsonas policijas nodaļa strādā, lai atrastu vainīgo, kad Kasandra nonāk dzīvībai bīstamā situācijā.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Limstoka ir pilsēta ar vairākiem apkaunojošiem noslēpumiem, taču, kad Mona Simingtona izdara pašnāvību, miss Mārpla uzskata, ka šis gadījums nav tik pašsaprotams.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Džeina Eira
programme.desc: Džeina atgriežas Tornfīldā pēc Misis Rīdas nāves, un Ročesters beidzot viņu bildina. Vai viņa piekritīs?

programme.title: Hārdakri
programme.desc: Šis ir stāsts par strādnieku šķiras ģimenes Hārdakru dzīvi, mīlestību un ceļu uz bagātību 19. gs. beigu Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids aptaujā ekscentriskus kaimiņus un uzzina par noslēpumainā zēna talantiem. Terēza turpina izmeklēšanu vienatnē, bet Žans Pjērs risina pagātnes problēmas un satiek Filipu.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Ir 1963. gads, un leģendārais detektīvs Sems Speids bauda pensijas gadus Francijas dienvidos, tomēr baumas par sena ienaidnieka atgriešanos izjauc šo idilli.

programme.title: "Tour of Luxembourg". Luksemburga-Luksemburga (152,8 km)
programme.desc: The Tour de Luxembourg is an annual stage race in professional road bicycle racing held in Luxembourg. The Tour de Luxembourg is classified as a 2.HC, the highest rating below the World Tour, by the Union Cycliste Internationale, the sports governing body. In 2006, the Tour became part of the UCI Europe Tour.

programme.title: Jumping | New York Global Champions League | Event 12 | Round
UEFA Champions League. Man City - Napoli
Новенькая
programme.desc: В элитную школу для детей богатых родителей попадает Вера - девушка из обычной семьи. Она сразу оказывается в центре запутанной детективной интриги и школьных конфликтов, и, конечно же, романтической истории. Но все не так просто: у Веры также есть тайна, и в элитном заведении она оказалась случайно...

programme.title: Corner Office
programme.desc: As Orson, The Authoritys newest employee, finds himself trapped in the absurdities of corporate life, his alienation deepens when he discovers a room hes told doesnt exist.

programme.title: Black Water
programme.desc: A deep cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.

programme.title: High Voltage
programme.desc: A group of young adults decides to rob a bank, only to discover that the bank is just a front for a Korean mob money laundering operation.

programme.title: Spooner
programme.desc: Facing eviction from his parents home on his 30th birthday, a socially awkward guy meets the girl of his dreams and creates his own rules for growing up.

programme.title: Its a Perfect Night for Suicide
programme.desc: A comedy about a psychic who pretends to believe that magic exists, a gigolo who pretends to believe the psychic, an illusionist who pretends to be somebody else and a desperate woman who believes she will find true happiness in love... when shes dead. Lenka is a psychic who besides telling fortunes is great at depriving her clients of them, with the help of an extraordinary uncle-illusionist. The business flourishes until Lenkas most profitable client, a soulful Buddhist Yvonne, decides to commit suicide. She was jilted by the man of her dreams - Oscar. Whats more, Yvonne wants to leave a suicidal note, pointing to Lenka as the cause of all her misfortunes. Lenkas entire world falls apart. She must dissuade Yvonne from killing herself and in her desperation is ready to use all her magical skills to make Oscar fall in love with Yvonne. However, Lenka doesnt even suspect shes entering the lions den. A dangerous game begins. The full moon is on the rise - and, surprisingly, the magic starts to work for real. It turns out that the scenario written in the stars is not an easy thing to change...

programme.title: Train Master
programme.desc: 62 year old Jeremiah Wilson is truly the Train Master of Willamette Western Railroad. He lives, breaths, and eats railroad. When Brett Banner, 32 year old heir to New York Eastern talks his dad into purchasing Willamette Western, there is immediately a clash between himself and Jeremiah. Jeremiah is fired by Brett two years from retirement and turns into a angry, depressed grandfather. When Bretts nine year old son Justin realizes Jeremiahs grandson Thomas can drive a locomotive, he kidnaps and holds Thomas favorite dinosaur ransom. Justin, Thomas and 3 other children board an old engine in for repairs and accidentally turns it into runaway engine causing a chain reaction of events.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: Answer Me
programme.desc: A drama from 2004 produced in Italy, the script of which was based on the novel by Susanna Tamaro. A couple in love gets married, but when their first-born son comes to the world, the life of a young couple turns into hell.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Music critic Bob is out of a job, addicted to Zoloft, and trying to wrangle the menagerie of animals that his wife Amy has accumulated. Will adopting a baby cure their existential angst? Or should they just rescue another duck?

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: A fisherman discovers an abandoned sailboat and decides to board. He finds no signs of life, but when he gets back on deck his own boat appears to have disappeared. What follows is an absolute nightmare.

programme.title: The Last Day of August
programme.desc: Dan (Michael Izquierdo) was paralyzed just over a year ago. Following months of recovery and overwhelmed by lifes new realities, he retreated to a family cabin in upstate New York. On the last day of August, his closest friends arrive unannounced to confront him about his recent reclusive and self-destructive behavior. Wanting to support him, yet skeptical of his psychological health, they attempt the tight-rope walk of loving confrontation in the hopes of convincing Dan to return home. Friendships are tested and love reveals itself in this independent drama about breaking down and breaking through. "The Last Day of August" is about the enduring power of love and friendship, and the struggle to overcome the mental and physical barriers that confront those living with addiction and disability. How we react to tragedy defines us, and when loved ones grapple with immense personal suffering, its not always apparent how to respond and whether the help we have to give is the help thats truly needed. This film is a personal examination of how destructive behaviors such as substance abuse and self-isolation emerge from trauma, and how one finds the strength to overcome.

programme.title: Wake
programme.desc: When things get tough for offbeat Carys Reitman, she does what any emotionally isolated, modern girl would do - she goes to strangers funerals. At one fateful funeral, she unexpectedly meets Tyler, a man mourning his fiancee. Despite the warnings of her undertaker best friend Shane and her roommate Lila, she finds herself connecting to someone for the first time. Searching for answers, Carys goes to see her estranged mother to confront her past. And as she tries to open herself to the risks of love with Tyler, she realizes she may have more to fear than just a broken heart.

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: Blind Obsession
programme.desc: During a gun battle with a pair of criminal brothers, police officer Jack Fletcher (Brad Johnson) incurs a wound that leaves him temporarily sightless. During his recovery, Jack is helped by Rebecca (Megan Gallagher), who works as a "trainer" for the newly blind. Gradually, Jack and Rebecca fall in love, much to the dismay of Rebeccas overprotective sister, Bedelia (Roxana Zal), who as a childhood incest victim has developed a pathological hatred for all men. Thus, once his sight is restored, Jack finds himself in the crosshairs of two potential assassins -- the demented Bedelia, and the brother of the crook he killed.

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: The true story of Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War photographs.

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Sarah tells Paul that she wants out of their marriage; the next day she disappears. A year later and Paul along with their children return to his childhood town to start anew after the loss of his wife and their mother.

programme.title: Among Thieves
programme.desc: Three friends - a reporter, an oil analyst and a financial executive - reunite after ten years and accidentally uncover one of the key, hidden reasons for what motivated the war in Iraq. The trio struggles to present evidence to major media that America invaded Iraq to force oil sales from the Euro back to the Dollar to preserve US global monetary supremacy. Against incredible odds, the team must face their pasts, find willing sources to corroborate the story, and survive the conspirators as they push to bring the truth to light.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
The Recall
programme.desc: When five friends vacation at a remote lake house they expect nothing less than a good time, unaware that planet Earth is under an alien invasion and mass-abduction.

programme.title: Dot.Kill
programme.desc: A detective tries to hunt down a serial killer who broadcasts his murders live on the internet.

programme.title: Kuponu karalienes
programme.desc: Garlaikota un izmisusi priekšpilsētas mājsaimniece kopā ar savu labāko draudzeni izveido nelikumīgu pārtikas atlaižu kuponu shēmu, ar kuru korporācijām izkrāpj miljoniem dolāru un nodrošina izdevīgus darījumus kuponu kārotājiem.

programme.title: Burbuļvannas Laika Mašīna
programme.desc: Pēc trakas ballītes, neskaitāmiem dzērieniem un "kokteiļa bākā" četri labākie draugi pamostas astoņdesmitajos. Viņi, protams, neatceras, kas notika iepriekšējā naktī un kā viņi nokļuva 1986.

programme.desc: Pastaiga pludmalē ar kurtu.

programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Kuponu karalienes
programme.desc: Garlaikota un izmisusi priekšpilsētas mājsaimniece kopā ar savu labāko draudzeni izveido nelikumīgu pārtikas atlaižu kuponu shēmu, ar kuru korporācijām izkrāpj miljoniem dolāru un nodrošina izdevīgus darījumus kuponu kārotājiem.

programme.title: Relikviju mednieki
programme.desc: Filmas pamatā ir reāli notikumi - lielākās relikviju medības pasaules vēsturē. Otrā pasaules kara beigās, lai saglābtu mākslas šedevrus, kurus nacisti konfiscēja visā Eiropā, tiek izveidota internacionāla mākslas vēsturnieku un zinātnieku komanda. Tajā pašā laikā vācu armija, kura ir tuvu savai sakāvei, saņem pavēli iznīcināt visus mākslas darbus, kuri atrodas viņu rokās. Vai puiši, kuri ir pazīstami ar Mikelandželo freskām un Da Vinči gleznām daudz labāk, nekā ar šautenēm un kara mākslu, spēs izglābt cilvēces lielākos kultūras sasniegumus?

programme.title: Burbuļvannas Laika Mašīna
programme.desc: Pēc trakas ballītes, neskaitāmiem dzērieniem un "kokteiļa bākā" četri labākie draugi pamostas astoņdesmitajos. Viņi, protams, neatceras, kas notika iepriekšējā naktī un kā viņi nokļuva 1986.

programme.title: Trīs musketieri: Milēdija
programme.desc: Musketieri nolemj apvienot spēkus ar noslēpumaino Milēdiju. Viņu plāns ir apturēt ienaidniekus, kamēr Francijas Karaliste ir sašķelta reliģisko karu dēļ un joprojām ir pakļauta britu draudiem.

programme.title: Rītdienas karš
programme.desc: Kāds vīrietis ir izvēlēts cīnīties nākotnes karā, kurā cilvēces liktenis balstīts uz viņa spēju tikt galā ar pagātni.

programme.title: Ostins Pauerss, spiegs, kurš mani iz..
programme.desc: Ostins Pauers ir visstilīgākais, visnekaunīgākais un visnevaldāmākais no visiem slepenajiem aģentiem! Taču viss viņa šarms var izzust vienā mirklī, jo Pauera lielākais ienaidnieks doktors Ļaunums ar laika mašīnas palīdzību nodomājis atgriezties 1960. gados un nolaupīt Pauera modžo, kas padara ar seksu apsēsto spiegu pievilcīgu pretējā dzimuma acīs!

programme.title: Kā tu to zini?
programme.desc: Pēc izslēgšanas no ASV softbola komandas un depresijas iestāšanās Līsa savā dzīvē nolēmusi veikt pārmaiņas. To rezultātā viņa nonāk mīlas trijstūrī, kurā kāds puisis no korporatīvās vides sācis cīnīties ar viņas esošo otro pusi.

programme.title: Normāls trips
programme.desc: Sekojot četriem draugiem, kuri ceļo pa Ķīnu, meklējot vienu no savām bioloģiskajām mātēm. Visi satuvinās un atklāj patiesību par to, ko nozīmē zināt un mīlēt sevi.

programme.title: Vīramāte-vellamāte
programme.desc: Apburošā Šarlote beidzot ir sastapusi savu ideālo vīrieti - ārstu Kevinu Fīldsu. Viņu laimei ir tikai viens šķērslis - Kevina māte! Valdonīgā un nepastāvīgā Viola Fīldsa, kura tikko zaudējusi darbu televīzijā kā šova vadītāja, nu visu uzmanību pievērsusi dēla karjerai. Baidoties, tikpat viegli kā zaudējot darbu, pazaudēt arī dēla uzmanību, Viola nolemj izjaukt laulības un kļūst par īstu vellamāti.

programme.title: Modiste
programme.desc: Tillija pēc 25 gadu prombūtnes ir atgriezusies mājās - vietā, kuru reiz viņai nācās pamest, jo cilvēki uzskatīja, ka viņa ir maza puisēna slepkava. Šo 25 gadu laikā Tillija ir kļuvusi par nepārspējami labu kleitu šuvēju, un nu viņa ir atpakaļ dzimtajā mājā, lai pierādītu savu nevainību.

programme.title: Novembris
programme.desc: 2015. gada novembrī Parīzi piemeklē virkne nepieredzētu nāvējošu uzbrukumu. Heloīzes un viņas galvenā komandiera Freda vadītā pretterorisma vienība ir spiesta cīnīties ar laiku, lai notvertu vainīgos pirms tie pastrādājuši jaunu šaušalīgu uzbrukumu.

programme.title: Privilēģijas būt vienam
programme.desc: Jautrs un aizkustinošs stāsts par pusaudžu problēmām, kura pamatā ir Stīvena Čobska tāda paša nosaukuma bestsellers, kas jau kļuvis par mūsdienu klasiku. Romāns aizraujoši un patiesi attēlo kāpumus un kritumus pusaudža ceļā uz pilngadību.

programme.title: Hičkoks
programme.desc: Būdams jau populārs un pieprasīts režisors, Alfrēds Hičkoks ļaujas pārdrošam eksperimentam - lielbudžeta filmu vietā uzņemt ļoti pieticīgu, melnbaltu trilleri "Psiho". Negūstot atbalstu no studijas puses, Hičkoks nolemj pats finansēt savu filmu. Kopā ar savu sievu un asistenti Almu Revilu, režisors dodas cilvēka dvēseles tumšāko bezdibeņu pētījumos, lai atrasto tos nervu galus, uz kuriem kā klavieres taustiņiem, meistars varētu nospēlēt skatītāju emocijās īstenu šausmu simfoniju.

programme.title: Lepnums un aizspriedumi
programme.desc: Kad Elizabete Beneta satiek izskatīgo misteru Dārsiju, viņa domā, ka viņš ir pēdējais vīrietis, ar kuru viņa jebkad varētu apprecēties.. Bet - abu dzīvēm savijoties, viņu tomēr savaldzina vīrietis, kuru viņa ir zvērējusi ienīst mūžīgi.

programme.title: Tolkīns
programme.desc: Autora Dž. R. R. Tolkīna dzīve agrīnajos gados, kad viņš, bez vecākiem palicis bārenis, sev līdzīgo studentu-atkritēju vidū rod draudzību, mīlestību un māksliniecisko iedvesmu.

programme.title: Hičkoks
programme.desc: Būdams jau populārs un pieprasīts režisors, Alfrēds Hičkoks ļaujas pārdrošam eksperimentam - lielbudžeta filmu vietā uzņemt ļoti pieticīgu, melnbaltu trilleri "Psiho". Negūstot atbalstu no studijas puses, Hičkoks nolemj pats finansēt savu filmu. Kopā ar savu sievu un asistenti Almu Revilu, režisors dodas cilvēka dvēseles tumšāko bezdibeņu pētījumos, lai atrasto tos nervu galus, uz kuriem kā klavieres taustiņiem, meistars varētu nospēlēt skatītāju emocijās īstenu šausmu simfoniju.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Next Baking Master: Paris
programme.desc: The final four shop for a dessert spotlighting cheese. Next, after a lesson from a sommelier, the competitors create desserts featuring alcohol.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Supermarket Stakeout
programme.desc: Supermarket Stakeout is an American cooking competition TV series presented by chef Alex Guarnaschelli. Every participant of the show has a budget of $500 to purchase the groceries from the customers of a nearby supermarket, and create dishes later out of it. In each round the host assigns the theme of the dish to cook. The chef whose dish is judged the least satisfactory is eliminated from the competition, and the final chef remaining gets a prize of $10,000.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Cooking doesnt have to be difficult, nor does it require extravagant ingredients that are hard to find. From her home kitchen in Sweden, Rachel Khoo shares her secrets to cooking, providing viewers with delectable recipes created from easy-to-source ingredients, and guaranteeing enjoyment when it comes to rustling up dinner. Though her recipes are laced with simplicity, they are packed with flavour and she encourages viewers to recreate these mouthwatering fares.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Joanna welcomes special guest Emma Lovewell into the kitchen to make traditional Asian dishes, including Japchae, yaki gyoza and egg drop soup.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Cake Masters
programme.desc: Americas most in demand cake designer, Duff Goldman, has a long list of A-list Hollywood stars all desperate for the cake of their dreams. This reality TV series follows Goldmans new Los Angeles bakery and the cakes that it creates for its rich and famous clientele. Whether he is making a cake with a panorama of Los Angeles for a million-dollar gala or making a playable guitar cake, Duff Goldman and his crew aim to make edible works of art unlike anything that has been seen before. The Hollywood elite love these cakes and their demands range from hilarious to scary but it does not scare the bakers, if anything it spurs them on.

Every participant of the show has a budget of $500 to purchase the groceries from the customers of a nearby supermarket, and create dishes later out of it. In each round the host assigns the theme of the dish to cook. The chef whose dish is judged the least satisfactory is eliminated from the competition, and the final chef remaining gets a prize of $10,000.

programme.title: Candy Land
programme.desc: Five teams of professional cake makers compete in a series of testing challenges, with the winning team taking home a whopping $25,000. Each team is challenged to create a stunning, edible showpiece, but they are also given further instructions as the show progresses. They must use all of their artistry, flair and baking talent to have any chance of impressing the judges and taking home the winnings.

programme.title: Halloween Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 1. Show.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

Each team is challenged to create a stunning, edible showpiece, but they are also given further instructions as the show progresses. They must use all of their artistry, flair and baking talent to have any chance of impressing the judges and taking home the winnings.

programme.title: Halloween Cookie Challenge

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: Twenty-four elite chefs enter the arena where they will spend the next 24 hours cooking, and theyll have to use their speed to impress judge Jet Tila.

programme.title: Chopped

At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

Every participant of the show has a budget of $500 to purchase the groceries from the customers of a nearby supermarket, and create dishes later out of it. In each round the host assigns the theme of the dish to cook. The chef whose dish is judged the least satisfactory is eliminated from the competition, and the final chef remaining gets a prize of $10,000.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Joanna shares her all-time favourite recipes, including Chicken Cordon Bleu, Gruyère Potato Casserole, and Arugula and Dried Cherry Salad.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Joanna shares her recipes for spinach enchiladas with a side of Mexican rice and charro beans, queso blanco, fresh tomato salsa and churro cookies.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: The Last Day of the Dictator
Lūsija
programme.desc: Seksapīlā blondīne Lūsija kļūst par bīstamāko un nāvējošāko sievieti uz pasaules, apveltītu ar nepārspējamu intelektu un pārcilvēciskām fiziskām spējām. No potenciāla upura viņa ir pārvērtusies par mednieci un dodas pa pēdām tiem, kuri viņu gribēja nogalināt.

programme.title: Ārpus kartes
programme.desc: Asa sižeta piedzīvojumu filma, kas veidota pēc populāras video spēļu sērijas, aizved mūs uz visdažādākajiem pasaules nostūriem, sekojot Neitam un Sallijam, kad viņi dodas bīstamā ceļā pēc "dižākajiem, nekad neatrastajiem dārgumiem", vienlaikus meklēdami Neita sen pazudušo brāli.

programme.title: Maijs decembrī
programme.desc: Pagājis 20 gadu, kopš 36 gadus vecā Greisija uzsāka romānu ar 13 gadus veco dēla klasesbiedru Džo. Tolaik skandāls tika plaši atspoguļots dzeltenajā presē, bet tagad viņi kopīgi audzina bērnus un izskatās pēc paraugpāra. Laimīgā ģimenes fasāde sāk irt, kad pie viņiem ierodas televīzijas aktrise Elizabete, lai veiktu izpēti savai nākamajai lomai, kurā atveidos Greisiju. Gaismā tiek izcelti nepatīkami fakti par bēdīgi slaveno dēku un uzjundītas sen aizmirstas emocijas.

programme.title: Millera meitene
programme.desc: Gotu stila Tenesijas vidusskolas pēdējā kursa skolniece un rakstniece Kairo studē literatūru pie Džonatana Millera, rakstnieka, kurš pievērsās mācīšanai, kad viņa romāni neguva panākumus. Kā grāmatu tārps viņa jau bija izlasījusi viņa uzdoto literatūru, atstājot uz viņu iespaidu. Viņš kļūst par viņas mentoru, un viņi pavada laiku kopā ārpus skolas, apmeklējot rakstīšanas pasākumus. Kairo labākā draudzene lesbiete, kura smejas par flirtēšanu ar skolas treneri, lai iegūtu to, ko vēlas, pārliecina viņu izmantot savu rakstīšanu, lai pavedinātu jau precēto Milleru. Kad Millers uzdod viņai starpposma uzdevumu agrāk nekā citiem, viņa izmanto šo uzdevumu, lai izpaustu savas iekšējās vēlmes par viņu uz papīra, iesaistot abus pretrunīgā situācijā.

programme.title: Megamainds pret Iznīcības sindikātu
programme.desc: Megamainda kādreizējā ļaundaru komanda Iznīcības sindikāts ir atgriezusies. Nesen kronētajam varonim Megamaindam nu jāsaglabā ļaundara tēls, līdz viņš varēs apvienot savus draugus, lai apturētu sliktos, kuri vēlas nosūtīt Metropilsētu uz Mēnesi.

programme.title: Bez pēdām
programme.desc: Tēvs un viņa trīspadsmit gadus vecā meita Portlendā, Oregonā, izdzīvo ideālo dzīvi. Līdz brīdim, kad neliela kļūda abu dzīves noved no sliedēm uz mūžiem.

programme.title: Kā Grinčs nozaga Ziemassvētkus
programme.desc: Vūvila ir maza, brīnumaina pilsētiņa, kas atrodas sniegpārsliņā. Visiem Vūvivas iedzīvotājiem ļoti patīk Ziemassvētki. Taču pilsētiņas tuvumā mīt Grinčs – ļoti nejauks radījums, kuram riebjas gan Ziemassvētki, gan arī vūvilieši, jo tie savulaik viņu izstūmuši no sava vidus. Redzot, kā viņi priecājas un gaida svētkus, Grinčs nolemj nozagt visas Ziemassvētku dāvanas. Bet varbūt kādai mazai meitenītei izdosies sadraudzēties ar Grinču un likt viņam mainīt savus plānus?

programme.title: Dziedi!
programme.desc: Kad viņa teātrim draud slēgšana, uzņēmējdarbībā pieredzējušais koala Basters Mūns (Metjū Makkonahijs) sarīko dziesmu konkursu. Daudziem vietējiem zvēriem tas rada iespēju izpausties. Cūka Rosita (Rīza Viterspūna) ir māte un mājsaimniece, kura atteicās no pusaudža sapņa kļūt par dziedātāju. Pusaudze dzeloņcūka Eša (Skārleta Johansone) ir pancīga roķere alternatīvās mūzikas grupā. Gorillu Džoniju (Tārons Edžertons) viņa tēvs (Pīters Serafinovičs) grib pārliecināt pievērsties savam banku aplaupītāja arodam. Ikkatrs no šiem radījumiem vēlas piepildīt savu sapni un dziedāt no visas sirds!

programme.title: Džumandži: Laipni lūgti džungļos
programme.desc: Četri vidusskolēni atrod vecu spēļu konsoli ar līdz šim neredzētu videospēli džumandži. Viņi iesaistās šajā spēlē, kas norisinās džungļos, un iemiesojas pašu izraudzītajos avataros. Jaunieši apjauš, ka džumandži ir kas vairāk par spēli, tā ir cīņa par izdzīvošanu. Lai uzvarētu spēlē, viņiem jādodas bīstamākajā piedzīvojumā mūžā, jāatklāj Alana Periša pirms 20 gadiem atstātās pēdas un jāmaina priekšstats pašiem par sevi, pretējā gadījumā viņi paliks ieslēgti spēlē uz visiem laikiem...

programme.title: Episkā filma
programme.desc: Episkais ķinis ir ļoti episks, par to nešaubieties! Stāsta centrā ir četri bāreņi – vienu no tiem piedzīvojumā ierauj Luvras kuratora pēctecis, otrs grib kļūt par meksikāņu brīvības cīnītāju, trešo bāreni sastopam, pateicoties čūskām lidmašīnā, bet ceturtais ir puslīdz normāls mutants no X sabiedrības. Katrs no četriem mīklainos apstākļos tiek pie zelta biļetes, kas sniedz iespēju apmeklēt šokolādes fabriku. Viens pēc otra viņi iekuļas dīvainā drēbju skapī, kas nabagus aiztransportē uz Gnārnias zemi (ar G!). Tur viņi sastop ekstravagantu pirātu kapteini, kā arī nopietnus burvestību skolas studentus un noslēdz sadarbības līgumu ar gudru, bet seksuāli norūpējušos lauvu, lai pieveiktu ļauno Balto Kuci, kas uzkundzējusies Gnārnijā.

programme.title: 65: Iznīcības robeža
programme.desc: Pēc katastrofālas avārijas uz nezināmas planētas pilots Milss ātri vien aptver, ka viņam un otrai dzīvi palikušajai pasažierei Koai ir tikai vienīga iespēja izglābties – viņiem jātiek pāri nezināmajam apvidum, kuru pārņēmuši bīstami radījumi, un jāliek lietā visi spēki, lai izdzīvotu.

programme.title: Atsitiens
programme.desc: Endrjū ir jauns un ambiciozs džeza bundzinieks, gatavs kļūt par labāko no labākajiem ASV austrumkrasta mūzikas vidusskolā – atspēriena punktā uz lielo skatuvi. Despotiskais pasniedzējs Terenss pamana Endrjū un iekļauj viņu džeza orķestra sastāvā, uz visiem laikiem izmainot jaunieša dzīvi. Endrjū vēlme kļūt par labāko drīz pārvēršas apsēstībā, un Terensa nežēlīgās mācību metodes nostāda viņu gan uz fizisko spēju, gan arī saprāta robežas.

programme.title: Naudas cena: Largo Vinča piedzīvojums
programme.desc: Largo Vinčs izmisīgi meklē savu nolaupīto dēlu, saprotot, ka pēdas pie tiem, kas izraisījuši viņa bankrotu, varētu aizvest arī pie Largo dēla.

programme.title: Ja Bīla iela spētu runāt
programme.desc: Nemirstīgs mīlasstāsts gan par pāra nesaraujamo savienību, gan afroamerikāņu ģimenes iedvesmojošo motivāciju. 70. gadu sākumā Hārlemā meita un topošā sieva Tiša atminas kaisli, respektu un uzticību, ko viņa ieguva no attiecībām ar savu līgavaini, mākslinieku Alonzo Hantu jeb Foniju. Kā draugi jau kopš bērnības, abi izveidojās par pāri ar kopīgu nākotni, taču viņu plāni mainījās, kad Foniju arestēja par noziegumu, ko viņš nebija pastrādājis.

programme.title: Draiskule
programme.desc: Kopš bērnības Eimijas brunčumednieks tēvs ir pārliecinājis viņu, ka monogāmija nav iespējama. Tagad Eimija strādā žurnāla redakcijā un dzīvo ar šādu pārliecību, baudot dzīvi, kas ir brīva no smacējošām, garlaicīgām romantiskajām saistībām, tomēr patiesībā viņa ir iegrimusi rutīnā. Reiz Eimija secina, ka sāk iemīlēties sava jaunā raksta varonī – apburošajā un veiksmīgajā sporta ārstā Āronā Konersā. Tas liek sievietei prātot, vai citi pieaugušie, tostarp šis puisis, kuram ir patiesas simpātijas pret Eimiju, varētu pārliecināt viņu mainīt dzīves filozofiju.

programme.title: Viņi
programme.desc: Pusaudžu grupa LGBTQ+ konversijas terapijas nometnē piedzīvo satraucošas psiholoģiskās tehnikas, kamēr viņus vajā noslēpumains maskēts slepkava.

programme.title: Miljoniem iespēju, kā atdot galus
programme.desc: Filma, kuras darbība norisinās Amerikas rietumos 1882. gadā, vēsta par gļēvo fermeri Albertu (Sets Makfārleins), kura draudzene (Amanda Saifrīda) pamet viņu veiksmīgākā un izskatīgākā bārddziņa dēļ. Alberts vada savas dienas vientulībā un cenšas izvairīties no nāves, taču drīz vien pilsētā nonāk noslēpumainā Anna, kura ātri vien apbur Albertu. Kad pilsētā ierodas viņas vīrs, kurš ir bēdīgi slavens bandīts, Albertam jāsaņem drosme stāties viņam pretī.

programme.title: Everests
programme.desc: 1996. gada 10. maija rītā divas alpīnistu komandas uzsāk pēdējo posmu ceļā uz Everestu, kas ir pasaules augstākā virsotne. Piepeši kalnu grēdu pārņem negaiss, un piedzīvojumu meklētājiem ceļu aizšķērso cilvēces vēsturē spēcīgākā sniega vētra. Šajos skarbajos apstākļos komandām ir jāiztur stindzinoši brāzmains vējš un mežonīgs aukstums, lai izdzīvotu gandrīz neiespējamā situācijā.

programme.title: Suņa dzīves jēga
programme.desc: Sirsnīgs un pārsteidzošs stāsts par uzticīgu suni, kurš, būdams līdzās dažādiem saimniekiem dažādos laikos, mācot cilvēkiem priecāties un mīlēt, atrod pats savas dzīves jēgu. Ģimenes filmu, kas aizraujošā veidā parāda pasauli no suņa skatu punkta.

programme.title: Mednieks un ledus karaliene
programme.desc: Ļaunā Ravenna uzzina, ka viņas māsa karaliene Freija gaida mazuli un mīl kādu augstmani. Freija dzemdē meitenīti, bet viņas mīļākais nogalina mazuli un Freijas dusmas atbrīvo ledus spēku, kas nogalina mīļāko. Freija dodas uz ziemeļiem, lai uzbūvētu pili un izveidotu armiju, kura nozog bērnus un izaudzina tos par nežēlīgiem kareivjiem. Paiet gadi, un Ēriks un Sāra ir izauguši un iemīlējušies viens otrā. Viņi plāno aizbēgt no pils, bet Freija starp viņiem uzbūvē ledus sienu. Kādu dienu Sniegbaltīte saslimst, un viņas vīrs meklē Ēriku, lai pateiktu, ka burvju spogulis ir nozagts, kad tika vests uz patvērumu. Ēriks apvienojas ar diviem rūķīšiem, lai atrastu spoguli, taču viņu meklējumi ir saistīti ar briesmām.

programme.title: Čārlija eņģeļi
programme.desc: Noslēpumainā Čārlza Taunsenda detektīvaģentūra atvērusi birojus visā pasaulē. Tās paspārnē vairāku Bosliju vadībā izveidotas Eņģeļu komandas, kurās darbojas visgudrākās, visdrosmīgākās un visaugstāk kvalificētās sievietes, kam jātiek galā ar vissarežģītākajiem uzdevumiem jebkur uz zemeslodes.

programme.title: Līgavu kari
programme.desc: Labākās draudzenes Līva (Keita Hadsone) un Emma (Anna Heteveja) allaž sapņojušas par nevainojamām kāzām slavenajā Ņujorkas viesnīcā "Plaza". Gluži nejauši abu kāzas ieplānotas vienā un tai pašā datumā. Vienai no viņām acīmredzot būs jāizvēlas cita diena, vai ne? Ko vēl ne!

programme.title: Pasaules ieņemšana. Cīņa par Losandželosu
programme.desc: Zemi pārsteidz nezināma ienaidnieka uzbrukums – krīt nepārtraukts milzīgu meteorītu lietus, savā ceļā izpostot visu. Ātri vien kļūst skaidrs, ka pasauli cenšas iekarot citplanētieši. Tiem pretī nekavējoties stājas armija, taču spēki nešķiet samērīgi. Jūras kājinieku seržants Nants jau gatavojās atvaļināties, taču nu tiek nozīmēts uz jaunzveidoto kaujas vienību. Šīs vienības uzdevums ir glābt civiliedzīvotājus, kas ieslodzīti policijas iecirknī citplanētiešu iekarotajā teritorijā. Ir tikai trīs stundas laika, lai paveiktu misiju, jo tad Gaisa spēkiem tiks dota komanda bombardēt šo teritoriju.

programme.title: Likteņa ironija
programme.desc: Nekustamo īpašumu aģente Margo un advokāts Grifins varētu būt ideāls pāris, diemžēl abi viens par otra eksistenci pat nenojauš. Turklāt dienu pirms Vecgada vakara Margo un Grifins iesāk ar lielām cerībām – viņiem ir īpaši plāni vakaram ar savām otrajām pusītēm. Taču liktenis visu saliks savās vietās: pēc jautras ballītes ar draugiem taksists Grifinu aizvedīs uz norādīto adresi, tikai... nepareizajā pilsētā! To, ka iekļuvis neīstajā namā, viņš sapratīs vien tad, kad mājās pārnāks Margo.

programme.title: Noteikumi nav svarīgi
programme.desc: Holivudā ir 1958. gads. Topošā tikumīgā aktrise Marla Mabrijs (Lilija Kolinsa) un šoferis Frenks Forbss (Aldens Ērenraihs) uzreiz iepatīkas viens otram. Dzimstošais romāns ir neveikls, jo Marla ir dievbijīga baptiste un Frenks ir saderinājies ar draudzeni kopš vidusskolas laikiem. Papildu problēmas rada viņu darba devējs, kurš ir ekscentriskais aviācijas miljardieris Hovards Hjūzs (Vorens Bītijs) un kurš ir aizliedzis personālam tikties ar aktrisēm, kuras pieņēmis darbā. Marlas un Frenka attiecības sajaucas ar Hjūza arvien dīvaināko uzvedību un liek viņiem pārvērtēt savus principus un dzīves izvēles.

programme.title: Marija
programme.desc: Marija Kallasa, pasaulē izcilākā operdziedātāja, pavada savas dzīves pēdējās dienas 1970. gadu Parīzē, saskaroties ar savu identitāti.

programme.title: Tikai drosmīgie
programme.desc: Uz patiesiem notikumiem balstīts stāsts par kādu ugunsdzēsēju vienību, kas ar savu varonību, apņēmību un spēju upurēties kļūst par vienu labākajām ugunsdzēsēju vienībām ASV. Kamēr vairums ļaužu izvairās no briesmām, viņi dodas tām pretī, sargājot citu cilvēku dzīvību, mājas un visu, kas tiem dārgs. Viņi kļūst kā brāļi, un tam ir īpaša nozīme, kad nākas stāties pretī kādam liktenīgam ugunsgrēkam. 2013. gada vasara. Arizonas štatā plosās postoši ugunsgrēki, un glābēju grupa dodas tos novērst. Aktieru vidū ir gan "Oskaram" nominētais Džošs Brolins, gan "Oskara" saņēmējs Džefs Bridžess.

programme.title: Inišeras Banšī
programme.desc: Kādā nomaļā Īrijas salā starp diviem ilggadējiem draugiem negaidīti pārtrūkst draudzības saites – kašķīgais vijolnieks Kolms pēkšņi nevēlas par Pedreku neko zināt. Pedreks mēģina noskaidrot, kas viņa draugam lēcies, taču tas ir un paliek noslēpums. Vienīgais, kas patiešām ir skaidrs – Kolms to domā ļoti nopietni.

programme.title: Futbols: Serie A. Roma - Torino
programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

programme.title: Futbols: Serie A. Atalanta - Lecce
programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Barcelona - Valencia
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Hokejs: Šveices Nacionālā līga. ZSC Lions - Lugano
programme.desc: The National League is a professional ice hockey league in Switzerland and is the top tier of the Swiss league system.

programme.title: Futbols: Serie A. Fiorentina - Napoli
programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

programme.title: LaLiga. Real Betis - Real Sociedad
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Vintage Flip
programme.desc: Jessie and Tina tackle a 1936 Spanish hacienda home in expensive Long Beach, CA, neighbourhood - and the kitchen and bathroom need a full remodel.

programme.title: Vintage Flip
programme.desc: Jessie and Tina restore an 1899 Queen Anne Victorian in Redlands, CA, thats full of original detail. Can they balance its charm while adding modern amenities?

programme.title: Fix My Flip
programme.desc: Real estate broker Page Turner brings her team, money, and tough love to help overwhelmed flippers get their wayward projects back on track.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Mexico Life

This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: Windy City Rehab
programme.desc: Windy City Rehab is a reality renovation show hosted by interior designer Alison Victoria. She and her expert team buy and restore old homes in her beloved Chicago historic neighborhoods. It is much more than a simple improvement of a house. Alison and her team are rescuing vintage houses and hold true to the original style and architecture as much as possible. They do their best to pay tribute to the historic roots, while integrating some modern makeovers.

programme.title: The Flipping El Moussas
programme.desc: Tarek and Heather begin their journey as a flipping power couple as they take on a canyon home with panoramic views. Also, they share that theyre expecting a baby!

programme.title: The Flipping El Moussas
programme.desc: Tarek and Heather take on a challenge with a spacious Spanish-style home. They encounter a lot of surprises, including costly delays.

programme.title: Brother vs. Brother
programme.desc: Property experts Johnathan and Drew Scott compete to complete their renovation projects. Alongside a chosen team of experts, the pair are given a budget of $500,000 and an equal timeline to complete their home renovations. In each episode the teams revamp a different property, which are then judged and valued by an appraiser and real estate expert to assess which property has seen a larger increase in value. The worst performing team member is eliminated from the show after each project, with the last team member standing taking home a $50,000 prize.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Kamohai and Tristyn want to make a profit in uncharted territory. But theyll have to look past termites and spiders to see a homes true potential.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Rehab Addict Lake House Rescue
programme.desc: Nicole completes the historic lake cottage she rescued from destruction. The team starts with beautifying the exterior, including the roof and porches.

programme.title: Living Aloha

programme.title: Tiny House, Big Living
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: The Nate And Jeremiah Home Project
programme.desc: Nate and Jeremiah reimagine a couples first home with a modern makeover and a family-friendly, relaxed vibe throughout.

programme.title: The Nate And Jeremiah Home Project

programme.title: No Demo Reno

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Rehab Addict Lake House Rescue
programme.desc: Nicole turns her attention to the inside of the cottage. She transforms the top floor into her own personal retreat and creates an amazing kids room.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Kamohai and Tristyn find a hidden gem in Kaneohe. They transform the modest space into a beautiful blend of nature and island living.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: First Home Fix
programme.desc: Raisa and Austin renovate a home in South LA, and having grown up in the area, Austins excited to take part in the rebirth of this historic location.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Shipwrecks, plane crashes, disappearances, and UFO sightings, oh my! This episode explores the Lake Michigan Triangle and many other wild and weird places, including a creepy doll-filled island, and caves that harbor deadly viruses.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are making some revolutionary deals in Boston, Massachusetts. The guys have a wicked awesome visit as they check out a Patriotic painting, try their hand at rowing, and take aim at a Brown Bess musket from the 1700s.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: Kevin Costners the West
programme.desc: After braving the Oregon Trail and settling near the Columbia River, Protestant missionaries Marcus and Narcissa Whitman seek to spread their Christian faith and bring their way of life to the local Cayuse people.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a loyal viewer capture an image of an alien probe? What is the identity of a creature spotted on camera? Did the legendary Men in Black call a man and threaten him? Tony Harris and his team of experts dive into these claims to find the truth.

programme.title: Clash of the Gods
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens

programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways the World Will End
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: Engineering Disasters
programme.desc: Human error and right circumstances can become the recipe for a disaster and cause tragedies and serious accidents. When engineering goes wrong, trains carrying hazardous materials derail, luxury cruise ships wreck on the rocks, bridges collapse, construction cranes fall from the sky, bringing destruction and death.
